CustomField.formula: CASE( Approved_for_use__c , "Yes", IMAGE("https://nvcrm--sfdcstage1--c.visualforce.com/resource/1614666550000/GraphicsPackNew/fatcow/farmfresh/16/accept.png","Yes",16,16), "No", IMAGE("https://nvcrm--sfdcstage1--c.visualforce.com/resource/1614666550000/GraphicsPackNew/fatcow/farmfresh/16/cancel.png","No",16,16), "pending", IMAGE("https://nvcrm--sfdcstage1--c.visualforce.com/resource/1614666550000/GraphicsPackNew/fatcow/farmfresh/16/help.png","Pending",16,16), "") + CASE( Approved_for_use__c , "Yes with restrictions", IMAGE("https://nvcrm--sfdcstage1--c.visualforce.com/resource/1614666550000/GraphicsPackNew/fatcow/farmfresh/16/accept.png","Y w/ restrictions",16,16), "") + CASE( Approved_for_use__c , "Yes with restrictions", IMAGE("https://nvcrm--sfdcstage1--c.visualforce.com/resource/1614666550000/GraphicsPackNew/fatcow/farmfresh/16/roadworks.png","Y w/restrictions",16,16), "") + CASE( Approved_for_use__c , "Yes under NDA", IMAGE("https://nvcrm--sfdcstage1--c.visualforce.com/resource/1614666550000/GraphicsPackNew/fatcow/farmfresh/16/accept.png","Y w/NDA",16,16), "") + CASE( Approved_for_use__c , "Yes under NDA", IMAGE("https://nvcrm--sfdcstage1--c.visualforce.com/resource/1614666550000/GraphicsPackNew/fatcow/farmfresh/16/application_cascade.png","Y w/NDA",16,16), "") + CASE( Approved_for_use__c , "No with exception", IMAGE("https://nvcrm--sfdcstage1--c.visualforce.com/resource/1614666550000/GraphicsPackNew/fatcow/farmfresh/16/cancel.png","N w/restrictions",16,16), "") + CASE( Approved_for_use__c , "No with exception", IMAGE("https://nvcrm--sfdcstage1--c.visualforce.com/resource/1614666550000/GraphicsPackNew/fatcow/farmfresh/16/asterisk_yellow.png","N w/restrictions",16,16), "")
CustomField.label: Alert
